description: We spoke with Abigail Spanberger, a recently elected congresswoman from Virginia, about her first days in the Capitol and what it means to be a Democrat today.
title: A Conversation With a Freshman Democrat
title_page: A Conversation With a Freshman Democrat - The New York Times
text:
A Conversation With a Freshman Democrat We spoke with Abigail Spanberger, a recently elected congresswoman from Virginia, about her first days in the Capitol and what it means to be a Democrat today.
Hosted by Michael Barbaro, produced by Rachel Quester and Jessica Cheung, and edited by Paige Cowett
